name: waf-spike
description: ## Goal This project shall:  - Create a REST API Stub for Incident Creations and will support basic CRUD. - Incidents will contain a: create data, Id, type, title, description - The stub will use javascipt and node - The stub should use json-serve container image - A data file called db.json should be used to seed the rest API - The datafile should be generated using faker-js - Generating a realistic description for incidents is the key as this will allow us to test the WAF
